categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Mojo" was the nickname of a Clone trooper captain who served in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars.

In 20 BBY, Captain Mojo was assigned to a Jedi task force, consisting of Jedi Masters Obi-Wan Kenobi, Plo Koon, Bruu Jun-Fan, Grohto, Ko Solok, and Padawan Tatsu, commissioned to hunt down the newly resurrected Sith Lord, Darth Maul and his brother, Savage Opress.
